metadata.title: CVE-2024-0746 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: A Linux user opening the print preview dialog could have caused the browserto crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7,and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
